(Ok, 1 more post)Lunarpine heard Shadow Wing over his comm. 
Shadow Wing always had a bad sense of timing, here he was tracking 
Primus knows what and she practically gives away his location if 
anyone happened to be scanning for signals.

He opened his link, "Make it quick Wing I'm busy." It was a gruff 
answer but it got his point across. 

"I knew I should have deactivated my link" the wolf thought as he 
found a place to take cover, just in case any unfriendlies happened 
by.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She searched the ship and couldn't find him anywhere.  That meant 
> he's out. Most likely hunting or something like that. She opened 
her 
> commlink up. "Lunarpine? Hello? Are you OK? Where are you?"
